replies.author: zjy
replies.txt_content: 坑爹，小的木乃伊好恶搞啊{:10_513:}

replies.author: Оil
replies.txt_content: 这个嘛，是一个变态的MOD，里面有很多变态的东西。

replies.author: oomanj
replies.txt_content: 目测LZ换了材质包，或者装了MOD

replies.author: sdbv
replies.txt_content: 金字塔不是用creeper沙岩起的嗎?[sandstone]

replies.txt_content:
zjy 发表于 2012-7-13 17:00

replies.author: ai1272590112
replies.txt_content: 不错，不过这木乃伊明显是僵尸改的
木乃伊有点跟僵尸一样也~

replies.author: 819tierqusi
replies.txt_content: 个人认为MC原本应该不会有这些东西，所以MOD无误
